mapper.update: UPDATE fzx_role SET enname = #{enname}, name = #{name}, mod_id = #{modeid}, role_grade = #{roleGrade}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = 0 WHERE id = #{roleId}
